subject: Re: [junit] Re: Are you really using JUnit during your development?
msgSnippet: ... I ve been off the demon drink for about thirteen years now, so you must have mistaken me for some other highly opinionated Englishman. ... Simon --
messageBody:
On 8/15/06, J. B. Rainsberger <jbrains@...> wrote:
> Brett L. Schuchert wrote:
>
> > >> From: Simon Chappell <simonpeterchappell@...
> > <mailto:simonpeterchappell%40gmail.com>>
> > >> religion. I'm sure it's possible to write code that is "good enough"
> > >> without TDD, but it'll never be high quality.
> >
> > You just made a strong claim:
> > Without TDD you'll never be high quality
>
> I'm pretty sure Simon was drunk when he wrote that, and he meant
> something else, didn't you, Sime?

I've been off the demon drink for about thirteen years now, so you
must have mistaken me for some other highly opinionated Englishman.
:-)

Simon

--
www.simonpeter.org
